title: Sales Specialist
job_overview:
Join us in building the next Walmart-sized retailer.

We’re assembling a world-class sourcing team—and we're looking for Seal Specialists to help us lock in the best deals with suppliers across the US and Europe. This is your chance to be on the ground floor of a retail empire in the making. If you love closing, moving fast, and building something big from scratch, keep reading.

What You’ll Do
Seal the deal — reach out to suppliers, pitch our model, and close product partnerships
Run high-volume outbound campaigns via email and phone
Own supplier relationships from first contact to signed agreement
Update progress in our CRM and follow up like a pro

You’ll Thrive Here If You:
Can work during US business hours
??Have advanced English proficiency, both written and especially spoken
Are outgoing, persuasive, and love the chase
Have endurance—you’re unfazed by repetitive tasks and long to-do lists
Are comfortable using Excel, email, and CRM tools
Are a closer at heart—you live to win and hate losing
